relevant_findings.general: No apparent distress, well appearing and pleasant
relevant_findings.HEENT: Normocephalic, atraumatic, extraocular movements intact, no scleral icterus
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, radial pulses 2+ bilaterally
relevant_findings.respiratory: Breathing comfortably on room air, clear to auscultation bilaterally
relevant_findings.gastrointestinal: Soft, mildly tender to palpation in the right lower quadrant, much improved from prior exams, no rebound, guarding, or distension

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild tenderness in the right lower quadrant has improved from prior examinations.
